game.name: 挂机后花园.放置牧场AFK back garden.idlepasture
game.shortDescription: Create your personal oasis in the corner of your desktop.​ This is a laid-back idle simulation game where simple clicks allow you to grow plants and feed adorable animals. Watch them thrive and multiply, receive surprise letters and gifts, and let the serene ambiance of nature fill your screen.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Create your personal oasis in the corner of your desktop.​ This is a laid-back idle simulation game where simple clicks allow you to grow plants and feed adorable animals. Watch them thrive and multiply, receive surprise letters and gifts, and let the serene ambiance of nature fill your screen.
game.developers: 她山之石Stones from Other Hills
